xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 18:39 <Not-29be> has joined #ccm 18:39 <Not-29be> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 pushed 1 commit to master [+0/-0/±4] http://git.io/Of0e9w 18:40 <Not-29be> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 6d35df5 - Sending prettyprint json uses lots of badwidth. -_- This should fix the " io.netty.handler.codec.EncoderException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The string is too long for this encoding." error some people are having with really complex configs. It also optimises some other network related things. 19:30 <Not-29be> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 pushed 1 commit to master [+0/-0/±9] http://git.io/tv9GcA 19:30 <Not-29be> [Pay2Spawn] dries007 412e9e9 - forgot to change over random tags in configurator Now random tags available in the messages! Use "$random[§a,§2,§3,§4,§5,§6,§7,§8,§9,§0,§a,§b,§c,§d,§e,§f]" for a random color!
